thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Mistake to remove comments altogether
thread.title_full: Mistake to remove comments altogether | News24

author: news24.com
title: Mistake to remove comments altogether
text:
Removing comments altogether is going to alienate a lot of viewers.
I personally think you should reconsider. People like interacting.
Yes a lot of people have nasty and irrelevant remarks. Use your discretion and don't place those that you consider offensive.
